episodes.title: The Moonie Cult Exposed By Former Member
episodes.description:
Reverend Sun Myung Moon, founder of the Unification Church, claimed to be the Messiah and built a global empire through thought reform, mass weddings, and strict control over followers. Born in North Korea in 1920, he used manipulative recruitment tactics, amassing wealth through businesses and politics. Despite legal troubles, his followers saw him as a persecuted prophet. Many ex-members describe the church as a controlling cult, leaving lasting psychological scars.

Make sure you subscribe to get your regular crime fix: youtube.com/c/RealCrime

episodes.title: Inside Charles Manson’s Dangerous Cult That Led to Murder
episodes.description:
Charles Manson became the leader of a hippie group in the California desert. He used his words to control his followers and convinced them to kill people, including actress Sharon Tate, in 1969. Manson's ability to manipulate his followers made him the leader of one of the most infamous cults ever.

episodes.title: 3hrs Of FBI's Most Wanted Cult Leaders
episodes.description:
In this episode of the Cult of Personality series, we learn about four influential cult leaders: Jim Jones, Charles Manson, Reverend Sun Myung Moon, and Warren Jeffs. It explains how Jim Jones' People's Temple shifted from community work to the tragic events in Jonestown. It also covers how Charles Manson convinced his followers to commit violent acts, how Reverend Moon maintained control over his church through mass weddings and persuasion, and how Warren Jeffs exerted power over the FLDS community through polygamy and strict control.

episodes.title: The Shocking Crime Revelations Inside Ultra-Orthodox Jewish Sect (Full Documentary) | Real Crime
episodes.description:
Revealing the crimes of child sex abuse in Australia and focusing on the ultra-orthodox Jewish sect Chabad. It highlights the story of Manny Wax, a survivor of child sex abuse in the Chabad community, who exposed the scandal and became the public face of it. Three individuals were arrested and convicted of child sex crimes as a result of Manny's revelations. The video also mentions a royal commission examining the ultra-orthodox attitudes that may have hindered victims from speaking out about the abuse. The live webcast of the commission was watched by many and it was the most watched since the commission began in 2013.

Make sure you subscribe to get your regular crime fix: youtube.com/c/RealCrime

episodes.title: The Murderous Cult Of Nation Of Yahweh | The FBI Files | Real Crime
episodes.description:
The 'R.I.C.O.' investigation of the Nation of Yahweh and its former leader, Yahweh ben Yahweh.

The decapitation of a young African-American male led the Miami-Dade police and the FBI along a trail of death. Authorities discovered that the man was a dissident member of a religious cult headed by a man who called himself Yahweh ben Yahweh, or 'God, Son of God'.

From The FBI Files S3 EP10
